fields.name: criterionNumber
fields.description: Number associated with the audience criterion in a formula. For example, (1 AND 2) OR 3. If unspecified, criteria are assigned numbers in the order that they’re added.

fields.name: criterionOperator
fields.description: Operator used in the personalization audience criterion. Values are: Contains Equal GreaterThan GreaterThanOrEqual Includes LessThan LessThanOrEqual NotEqual NotIncludes StartsWith

fields.name: criterionType
fields.description: Type of personalization audience criterion. Values are: Default—Audience has no criteria. Domain—Audience criterion is based on domain. FieldBased—Audience criterion is based on object fields. GeoLocation—Audience criterion is based on location. Permission—Audience criterion is based on standard or custom permissions. Profile—Audience criterion is based on profile.
